title: Sole Opinion
description: Custom React form to collect perspectives on shoes. For industrial designer Olivia Oomen's capstone research.

title: BACTracker
description: React Native application that includes a BAC calculator and an information hub answering commonly asked questions about alcohol.
techText: React Native, Bootsrap, Javascript, HTML, CSS

title: HuskySwaps
description: Interactive web app that allows users to post clothing they want to swap with other UW students. Includes user authentication with Firebase login.
techText: React, Bootsrap, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Firebase

title: King County Constituent Data Presentation
description: Choose your own adventure based presentation breaking down the constituent interests of District 3. Results come from my analysis of the responses to Councilmember Perry's survey.

title: The Movie Times
description: Interactive data interface analyzing the correlation between between COVID-19 and popularity of movies involving pandemics.
